investor.title: Join Our Growing Marketplace
investor.subtitle: Are you a project owner looking to showcase your products? Or an investor seeking new opportunities? Our platform connects innovative projects with potential investors and customers. Bring your products to our marketplace and reach a wider audience while growing your business.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our products, shipping, and services.

shipping.question: What are your shipping options?
shipping.answer: We offer standard and express shipping options. Standard shipping typically takes 5-7 business days, while express shipping takes 2-3 business days. International shipping is also available with various shipping times.

returns.question: What is your return policy?
returns.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery. Items must be in their original condition with all packaging and documentation. Please contact our customer service to initiate a return.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. All transactions are secure and encrypted.

authenticity.question: How do you ensure the authenticity of your products?
authenticity.answer: All our products come with authenticity certificates. We work directly with artists and verified suppliers to ensure the authenticity of every item in our collection.

customization.question: Do you offer customization options?
customization.answer: Yes, we offer customization options for many of our products. Please contact our customer service to discuss your specific requirements, and we'll be happy to help.

company.title: Company
company.description: Discover and share amazing art pieces from talented artists around the world. Join our community of art enthusiasts and creators.

contacts.title: Get in Touch
contacts.description: Have questions or want to learn more? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contacts.name: Your Name

description.part1: Naghilvari is a unique platform that brings together artisans and art enthusiasts. From handmade jewelry to paintings, from carpets to small sculptures, we present many types of art in this space. Our goal is to both provide artisans with access to a wide audience and present citizens with original and valuable works of art.
description.part2: Each handmade piece carries a story, and we play the role of a bridge to ensure these stories are passed on to future generations without being lost. Naghilvari unites both creative individuals and buyers interested in art around the same value.
description.part3: With this project born from the combination of innovative technology and traditional art, we open a new path for the preservation and spread of our culture. We believe that art should find its place not only in exhibitions but also in our daily lives. Naghilvari — art for every home, support for every artist!
